messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis, with the assistance of Chauffer Rodney Robinson, conducted a preliminary examination of the scene. Technician Muhammad documented the area and discovered a single spent casing marked as 'Win' 9mm Luger. Sergeant McMullen briefed Detective Morton on a blood trail leading from the scene to a nearby street. Detective Morton, upon examination, corroborated the findings. Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers performed a residue test on witnesses Darceleen Commodore and Earlitta Taylor. Coroner Investigator Parnell Williams officially ruled the incident a homicide. Detective Aucoin, after securing the scene, spoke with Marie and Indel Commodore. Detective Mathews prepared photographic line-ups for witness identification. Unit 520, led by Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, and other units manned by Officers Juan Lopez, Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, and Detectives Gregory Johnson, Jason McGee, Ananie Mitchell, Melvin McCullum, were all dispatched to various locations. Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary Sallienger sketched a broken doorjamb into the scene sketch.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Conducted a preliminary examination of the crime scene.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Documented the area and discovered a spent casing.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Briefed Detective Morton on a blood trail leading from the scene.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Corroborated the findings of the blood trail and interacted with witnesses and family members.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Performed a residue test on witnesses.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Coroner Investigator Parnell WilliamsOfficer Context: Officially ruled the incident a homicide.Officer Role: Coroner InvestigatorOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Context: Secured the scene and spoke with family members of the victim.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MathewsOfficer Context: Prepared photographic line-ups for witness identification.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant Chris RobertOfficer Context: Led Unit 520 to various locations.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Juan LopezOfficer Context: Manned a unit dispatched to a location.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officers Phil Burras & Quincy BroadenOfficer Context: Manned a unit dispatched to a location.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Officers Nate Addison & Glen HewittOfficer Context: Manned a unit dispatched to a location.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Detective Gregory JohnsonOfficer Context: Manned a unit dispatched to a location.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Jason McGeeOfficer Context: Manned a unit dispatched to a location.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ananie MitchellOfficer Context: Manned a unit dispatched to a location.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Melvin McCullumOfficer Context: Manned a unit dispatched to a location.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Officer Gary SalliengerOfficer Context: Sketched a broken doorjamb into the scene sketch as part of the Scientific Criminal Investigations Division.Officer Role: Officer
